title: I made buttons out of plastic straws : r/ZeroWaste - Reddit
body: Plastic, when heated, releases some pretty toxic, noxious chemicals that build up in your body over time and can cause cancer and other illnesses. I'm sure after this brief exposure you're not that bad off, but it's not a good idea to make a habit of this kind of thing. ... You just have to go out and buy some straws. Creating more demand which ...
